questions.quote: I know how much you make. I don't even know why I'm doing this, I don't even like basketball.
Well maybe we could go into business together. If you're clean?
Okay, Jerry. that's fine. you're the boss. Katie works for Jerry.
Why will she still do it? She hates you now. People don't do you favors after you dump them.

She had to be impressed by that conversation, had to! It was a great performance. I am unbelievable on the phone. On the date they should just have two phones on the table at the restaurant, done.
